overview: With his flawless timing, comedic brilliance and compelling stage presence, bombastic funnyman Pat Cooper always leaves his sold-out crowds in stitches -- be it in small comedy clubs or in major theaters. His vociferous signature style is clearly in evidence on this riotous video as he delivers diatribes about a potpourri of topics. Bonus material includes Cooper's hysterical take on food, "Mangia, Mangia."
title: Pat Cooper: You're Always Yelling
